dialog: Your ${pokemon_name} is tinier than any we have on record. Astounding.
Your ${pokemon_name} is below average in size.
Your ${pokemon_name} is above average in size.
The size of your ${pokemon_name} is... colossal. This is indeed exceptional. Fascinating!
Your ${pokemon_name} is so tiny, I almost didn't notice it!
Aww, what a small ${pokemon_name}! It's rather cute, I'd say.
Your ${pokemon_name} is rather sizable, that's for sure!
Your ${pokemon_name} is giganticâ€”the largest I've ever seen!
Wh-whoa. That's the tiniest ${pokemon_name} I've ever seen!
Your ${pokemon_name} is a little small for its kind, don't you think?
